## Core.Albums.normalizeAlbum() method

Returns normalized [AlbumKeys](./ts-music-metadata.core.model.albumkeys.md) for a supplied album, preferring those from the object itself, if present.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static normalizeAlbum<TA extends Model.IAlbum = Model.IAlbum>(album: TA): Model.AlbumKeys;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  album | TA | The album to be normalized. |

**Returns:**

[Model.AlbumKeys](./ts-music-metadata.core.model.albumkeys.md)
